none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on January 12, 2022 Description from Terminal Escape:
 A cassette that begs the question: What if I just listened to noise all the time? Is it the person on another plane who wants (or needs) to fill their life with these chaotic and oppressive sounds? Or does a life voluntarily filled with these sounds create, over time, a different person? Foreboding and calculated power electronics from BLUE SABBATH BLACK CHEER, an ominous sonic journey that feels like a constant crash. Rumbling low end harsh noise from SLATES, a disorientation through sound - the aural equivalent of being buried by an avalanche while your family watches you disappear. So I ask again...what if these were the only sounds?BLACK OCTOBER // UNTITLED
https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEiOUCDrZ8NUE2rtLctzt1mPiZC6k9TlmmKLpwai4QSF4eVsnPmWR7eBz44duO8y2TrLjB7YY13qhJA3K5eLvTbk8aq4iqryh7Ino28YFwDW_d2DOyxak4LWttW0dt089cl1WzPlVgXV6-Z1Cpzq5eBz4MNJO_2qVnIXAl_C5yN2b3tGaETXqz_WeNkQNQ=s1147 https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEgsFFR6N-axucDjcsTTGXLVPNb-3B9LrdN1Bt4FPWJHsV66O-bPF_jeoPs0ncRsdl8poZbMZvcdnG_aMQ1RScC-TNBHiX4Xv3yHPtzrXU1UDwKZIKHkCqO6cA-ay2zTogPtv6VsOWh6-BJFB6ln8vDH2HIbKk5zQzpq7Inyw-EZ2Vg0VIc2ZVRBz0YzxQ=s641
